Package marcocipriani.openfocuser.manager.fwconf

Class Updater

  • java.lang.Object
    • marcocipriani.openfocuser.manager.fwconf.Updater

  • public class Updater
extends java.lang.Object
    AVR Hex firmware uploader/updater utility. Windows and Linux.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    marcocipriani01

    • Constructor Detail

      • Updater

        public Updater​(Updater.AvrdudeListener listener)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Class constructor. Loads the available firmwares and boards, chooses the right AVR executable depending on the OS, creates the temp folder and copies in it the avrdude config file.
        Parameters:
        listener - avrdude listener.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if resources in the app jar are not found.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the system temp folder can't be initialized.
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the current OS doesn't support avrdude

    • Method Detail

      • getBoards

        public java.util.ArrayList<Updater.Board> getBoards​()
        Returns:
        a list of available boards.
        See Also:
        Updater.Board

      • getFirmwares

        public java.util.ArrayList<Updater.Firmware> getFirmwares​()
        Returns:
        a list of available firmwares.
        See Also:
        Updater.Firmware

      • updateFirmware

        public void updateFirmware​(Updater.Firmware firmware,
                           Updater.Board board,
                           java.lang.String port)
        Uploads the given firmware to the chosen board at the selected port. The whole process runs in another thread.
        Parameters:
        board - the board type.
        firmware - the firmware to upload.
        port - the port of the board.
